pages.title: Dimensions
pages.text: $(concept)The Nether/$ and $(concept)The End/$ have been removed. $(concept)Nether Portals/$ will do nothing, and $(structure)Strongholds/$ and $(structure)Ruined Nether Portals/$ will not spawn. Many resources found in these dimensions can be obtained in other ways.
$(item)Eyes of Ender/$ will locate $(structure)Ancient Cities/$ instead of $(structure)Strongholds/$
$(item)Magma Blocks/$ can be found commonly within the deepest layers of $(concept)Caves/$. Mill it to create $(item)Cinder Flour/$, and a small chance of $(item)Soul Sand/$.
